title: Person Of Interest Extended Pilot: Zenith Will Watch
author: Zenith & Crew
comment: I wish I was able to afford this series. Sounds like combo of the original EQUALIZER & Vengeance Unlimited!
Very good commentary. Finch and Reese operated on a high level of guilt. They both had the same driving force.

Finch deserves the guilt he feels, for building the machine. 
Giving up freedom and privacy for safety is as foolish selling so called freedom at such a huge price.

as someone who spent most of my adult life in the army doing things that won't see the light of day untill long after i'm dead, i am able to wrap my head around how he thinks and feels. survivors guilt can be a very strong motivator.
I loved your view on the episode. Thanks for the video! :3
description:
Hello everyone and welcome back to Zenith Will Watch, where I take a look at a tv show that patrons have asked me to watch. Today I take a look at the extended cut of the Person Of Interest pilot.

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
Please watch: "Top 13 Disney Films Of 2019: The Disney Debate Episode 85"
